home.heading: Hi, I Am Krishna Singh.
description: I'm aspiring to be a Sofware Engineer studying Bachelor of Technology at Babu Banarasi Das University. I enjoy coding and designing applications. In my free time, I like playing chess, mobile games, and travelling.

about.title: About Me
content: I'm Krishna Singh, an aspiring Software Engineer studying Bachelor of Technology at Babu Banarasi Das University. My passion lies in coding and designing practical solutions that make a difference.

Beyond the code, I enjoy playing chess, mobile games, and travelling. I continuously seek new skills and challenges, and I also love teaching because I believe sharing knowledge is one of the greatest gifts one can offer.

I was born on October 28, 2007 in Lucknow and experienced computers quite early, although not much with the internet. A fun fact: I used to play GTA Vice City when I was 4 years old. I don't remember the cheat codes, so I used to write them on paper. It was the first game I played, and I still remember it well. That interest in gaming eventually led me to develop an interest in game development and programming.

items.heading: Gaming
items.description: I enjoy playing games like Call of Duty Mobile and BGMI in my free time. In Childhood, I used to play games like GTA Vice City, San Andreas and Liberty City. I Have Also Enjoyed Need For Speed Most Wanted, Carbon and Hot Pursuit Series.

items.heading: Coding
items.description: I enjoy coding because I love creating and designing, and coding is my go-to tool for bringing ideas to life. I also know several programming languages, including Java, Python, JavaScript, and C.
I enjoy teaching because I believe everyone has the right to learn. It also helps me improve my understanding of a topic and gain fresh perspectives.
